    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InternalCallContext createInternalCallContext(CallContext context)
      Create an internal call context without populating the account record id

      This is used for update/delete operations - we don't need the account id in that case - and also when we don't have an account_record_id column (e.g.
      InternalCallContext createInternalCallContext(Long accountRecordId, InternalCallContext context) 
      InternalCallContext createInternalCallContext(Long tenantRecordId, Long accountRecordId, InternalCallContext context) 
      InternalCallContext createInternalCallContext(Long tenantRecordId, Long accountRecordId, String userName, CallOrigin callOrigin, UserType userType, UUID userToken)
      Create an internal call context

      This is used by notification queue and persistent bus - accountRecordId is expected to be non null
      InternalCallContext createInternalCallContext(UUID accountId, CallContext context)
      Create an internal call context using an existing account to retrieve tenant and account record ids

      This is used for r/w operations - we need the account id to populate the account_record_id field
      InternalCallContext createInternalCallContext(UUID objectId, ObjectType objectType, CallContext context)
      Crate an internal call context from a call context, and retrieving the account_record_id from another table

    • Method Detail

      • createInternalTenantContext

        public InternalTenantContext createInternalTenantContext(TenantContext context)
        Create an internal tenant context from a tenant context

        This is used for r/o operations - we don't need the account id in that case

        Parameters:
        context - tenant context (tenantId can be null only if multi-tenancy is disabled)
        Returns:
        internal tenant context

      • createInternalTenantContext

        public InternalTenantContext createInternalTenantContext(Long tenantRecordId,
                                                @Nullable
                                                Long accountRecordId)
        Create an internal tenant context
        Parameters:
        tenantRecordId - tenant_record_id (cannot be null)
        accountRecordId - account_record_id (cannot be null for INSERT operations)
        Returns:
        internal tenant context

      • createInternalCallContext

        public InternalCallContext createInternalCallContext(UUID objectId,
                                            ObjectType objectType,
                                            CallContext context)
        Crate an internal call context from a call context, and retrieving the account_record_id from another table
        Parameters:
        objectId - the id of the row in the table pointed by object type where to look for account_record_id
        objectType - the object type pointed by this objectId
        context - original call context
        Returns:
        internal call context from context, with a non null account_record_id (if found)

      • createInternalCallContext

        public InternalCallContext createInternalCallContext(UUID accountId,
                                            CallContext context)
        Create an internal call context using an existing account to retrieve tenant and account record ids

        This is used for r/w operations - we need the account id to populate the account_record_id field

        Parameters:
        accountId - account id
        context - original call context
        Returns:
        internal call context

      • createInternalCallContext

        public InternalCallContext createInternalCallContext(UUID accountId,
                                            String userName,
                                            CallOrigin callOrigin,
                                            UserType userType,
                                            @Nullable
                                            UUID userToken)
        Create an internal call context using an existing account to retrieve tenant and account record ids
        Parameters:
        accountId - account id
        userName - user name
        callOrigin - call origin
        userType - user type
        userToken - user token, if any
        Returns:
        internal call context

      • createInternalCallContext

        public InternalCallContext createInternalCallContext(UUID objectId,
                                            ObjectType objectType,
                                            String userName,
                                            CallOrigin callOrigin,
                                            UserType userType,
                                            @Nullable
                                            UUID userToken)
        Create an internal call context using an existing object to retrieve tenant and account record ids
        Parameters:
        objectId - the id of the row in the table pointed by object type where to look for account_record_id
        objectType - the object type pointed by this objectId
        userName - user name
        callOrigin - call origin
        userType - user type
        userToken - user token, if any
        Returns:
        internal call context

        public InternalCallContext createInternalCallContext(UUID objectId,
                                            ObjectType objectType,
                                            String userName,
                                            CallOrigin callOrigin,
                                            UserType userType,

      • createInternalCallContext

        public InternalCallContext createInternalCallContext(@Nullable
                                            Long tenantRecordId,
                                            Long accountRecordId,
                                            String userName,
                                            CallOrigin callOrigin,
                                            UserType userType,
                                            @Nullable
                                            UUID userToken)
        Create an internal call context

        This is used by notification queue and persistent bus - accountRecordId is expected to be non null

        Parameters:
        tenantRecordId - tenant record id - if null, the default tenant record id value will be used
        accountRecordId - account record id (cannot be null)
        userName - user name
        callOrigin - call origin
        userType - user type
        userToken - user token, if any
        Returns:
        internal call context

      • createInternalCallContext

        public InternalCallContext createInternalCallContext(CallContext context)
        Create an internal call context without populating the account record id

        This is used for update/delete operations - we don't need the account id in that case - and also when we don't have an account_record_id column (e.g. tenants, tag_definitions)

        Parameters:
        context - original call context
        Returns:
        internal call context

      • createInternalCallContext

        public InternalCallContext createInternalCallContext(Long accountRecordId,
                                            InternalCallContext context)

      • createInternalCallContext

        public InternalCallContext createInternalCallContext(Long tenantRecordId,
                                            Long accountRecordId,
                                            InternalCallContext context)
